status.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your order has been successfully placed and payment confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

complete.title: Order Complete!
complete.description: Your order has been completed successfully. Thank you for your purchase!

failure.title: Payment Failed
failure.description: Unfortunately, your payment could not be processed. Please check your payment details and try again.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error while processing your order. Please try again or contact support.

cancel.title: Order Cancelled
cancel.description: Your order has been cancelled. No charges have been made to your payment method.

pending.title: Payment Pending
pending.description: Your payment is being processed. This may take a few minutes. Please do not refresh or close this page.

processing.title: Processing Order
processing.description: We're currently processing your order. You will be notified once it's complete.
